summary: A few variations on Lydia. Options available.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][b][u]Description[/u][/b][/size][size=3] I fell in love with Lydia very early in the game,so I just couldn’t bring myself to create a mod which changes her facial structure,
I love her face too much! However, some changes were welcome. I created eight
variants of Lydia, all of which remove her excessively plastered makeup.[/size]
[size=3]
[/size][list=1]
[*][size=3]Plain – Makeup removed. No other changesfrom Vanilla[/size]
[*][size=3]Plain Blonde Version[/size]
[*][size=3]Lovely – My interpretation of Lydia postmarriage. She has grown her hair and wears a more sensual style of makeup[/size]
[*][size=3]Lovely Blonde Version[/size]
[*][size=3]Battle Ready – Lydia has applied her woadand is prepared for combat[/size]
[*][size=3]Battle Ready Blonde Version[/size]
[*][size=3]Battle Hardened – Lydia is a true veteranand bares the scars of war. [/size]
[*][size=3]Battle Hardened Blonde Version[/size]

[/list]These mods are mutually exclusive, please choose only one.
[b][u]
Installation[/u][/b]
 
Install using NMM, or install manually byextracting both files of the chosen mod into your data folder. Please note that
these are bsa and esp files, not texture overrides, so they belong directly in
the data folder, nowhere else.
 
These files do not apply textures, they onlymodify existing features, so there [i]shouldn’t[/i] be any neck seams, unless you already have that problem.
 
[b][u]Requirements[/u][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/]ApachiiSkyHair [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url]
 
[b][u]Permissions[/u][/b]
This mod was designed using [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu [/url], I therefore claim no ownership of this mod.

[u]Credits[/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2950481/?]expired6978[/url] for RaceMenu
author: Athaloc
